thread.title: Go to place
thread.title_full: Go to place - Review of The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mike k
title: Go to place
text:
I have stayed at this hotel a few times, and it is my go to place in mid town. Clean, affordable, and well run. The parking attendants out front make arrival/departure easy, the bag check process is convenient if you want to leave your bags, and check in is a breeze. Rooms are comfortable and immaculate.
Room Tip: like anywhere in Manhattan, the higher floor are quieter See more room tips
